results.name: The Legend of Tine, Craffel kriegt auf die Waffel

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: min. Windows 7 (SP1+) and Windows 10
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable
  • Storage: 320 MB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

results.name: Xtreme Holiday (onurbl, Lia Godoy, Delahaye_Artworks, MaquiavelDS)
